name: Lion and the King
description:
Back of Jewel Case - Playstation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

Robin is the son of the great king of the lions. Watch as he goes in search of the treasure of the Black Panther. He is joined by Keno, in the search, where they find true friendship.

As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Lion and the King features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game, bringing the creatures of the jungle to life!
